short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HonestGuard ensures safe browsing by allowing access only to approved websites, protecting children’s online experiences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HonestGuard is a Chrome extension designed for parents seeking to create a secure and focused online environment for their children. With HonestGuard, you can maintain a custom whitelist of approved websites, ensuring that only the sites you select are accessible—everything else is automatically blocked. This gives you complete control over your child’s browsing experience, helping to keep them safe online.
